name: Flower Flux
description:
Welcome to Flower Flux! Help your friend Gatsbee keep the garden alive while his hive is away! Pollinate flowers and collect pollen to keep the flowers in tip-top condition! How To Play
  • Move Gatsbee with WASD on the keyboard to fly around the garden!
  • Hold the Spacebar while on top of a flower to pollinate them!
  • Weather will affect your speed and take some of your pollen!
  • Flower types will change depending on the level. See if you can get them all!
Be careful of the weather!Hide under your flowers to stay safe! Found Assets

    • Coiny Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Coiny?preview.text=fsdfhlsflnasjnflfnsdfsSDFSDFSDFds&preview.text_type=custom#standard-styles
